  rt = dat$mid
    x11()
    plot(rt, type="l", col="blue", main="Gold Price", xlab="TBC", 
ylab="Price", ylim=range(rt), xaxt="n")

axis(1, at=1:7, lab=c("Dec '11", "Jan '12", 
    "Feb '12", "Mar '12", "Apr '12", "May '12", "June '12"))
